programme.title: The Masked Singer S2
programme.desc: The Masked Singer is a singing competition guessing game based on the Korean format King of Mask Singer. The performers are celebrities wearing elaborate head to toe costumes to conceal their identities from the host, panelists, audience, and other contestants.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: The Champions
programme.desc: The premise is to round up the winners and/or most notable contestants from seasons 1-13 and have them face off head-to-head to see who is the ultimate America's Got Talent top act. America's Got Talent: The Champions will not just showcase the very best from the U.S. apparently. The show will pull top acts from global versions of the AGT franchise too.

programme.title: China: Nature's Ancient Kingdom
programme.desc: The world's largest conservation project has been created in China. Discover the breathtaking wildlife hidden inside its stunning national parks. This stunning series opens with China's mountainous terrains, where foxes, antelopes, and snow leopards thrive in harsh conditions. It then moves to dense forests that host the extraordinary snub-nosed monkeys and iconic giant pandas.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Drivers
programme.desc: In this series, we see hilarious, outrageous and hazardous footage taken directly from streets around the globe. From the motorcyclist who ended up back-flipping off a cliff, to the have-a-go hero who pulled a grandmother out of a burning car.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos: Top 10 Countdown S2b
programme.desc: Funny real-life moments captured on video are presented in this countdown clip show.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S20
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Xavier Riddle And The Secret Museum S1
programme.desc: Come along with Xavier Riddle, the most effusive pint-sized history adventurer; Yadina, his effervescent little sister; and his brilliant best friend Brad, as they unravel the secrets of world famous heroes from history!

programme.title: OddBods S3
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: Jet and friends try to redesign Jet 2 to be their own personal Mars rover, but discover that Mars' rocky terrain is a challenge. In repeated brainstorming sessions, the kids make their own "Mars Yard" replica in Jet's yard, trying to design the right wheels for Jet 2. In the end, the kids don't manage to find the perfect wheels for Jet 2 on Mars, but vow to do more research, and discover that they DID create the perfect wheels for Mitchell's new scooter.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S3
programme.desc: An engineer named Rusty leads a team of rescue robots. Together, they invent their way out of difficult situations.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The children head to the Far East to join Pig & Panda's comedy talent show. But what happens when the jokes are played on the children? Mama Ling starts a new food delivery service, but it doesn't go well and her rating drops. What will the children do to help Mama Ling improve her business?

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S6
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: When Triangle Alien Sister has trouble following Cherry's new dance routine, Ollie and friends realise she needs glasses. It's up to Cherry to show her that wearing glasses isn't so bad. But what will happen when Cherry breaks her own glasses and has to perform her dance routine without them? The Shifty Squares are opening a new Winter Wonderland in the middle of Ollipolis and everyone's excited.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S1

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: This week Jimmy heads 500km east of Darwin to the remote Arnhem Land coastal community of Maningrida. Jimmy visits Maningrida Wild Foods and goes out harvesting with local landowners for various bush foods that are now sold commercially. Traditional owner Leila Nimbadja shares stories from her childhood and takes Jimmy to hunt for long yam. Jimmy catches up with Don Wilton, one of only a few people in the Northern Territory with an Aboriginal Coastal Fishing Licence.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S9
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: Films & Stars

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Ah Yoke offers to babysit Maxine but it ends in disaster. Ah Hock helps Kenneth to prepare for his big pitch. Rosnani worries that Zara is working in Everyday Soy for the wrong reasons.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: A frustrated Xue Ling joins Peter Tay for some wine and Adam is not too pleased to see her home drunk, and the tense atmosphere between them escalate to another full blown argument.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - At The Vets
programme.desc: (Encore) Pet ownership is on the rise due to COVID-19 and vets are busier than ever. On The Red Dot enters the clinics of three of Singapore's busiest vets, for a look at what happens at the vets.

programme.desc: Bored with searching rocks for evidence of their recent findings, Adelaide accepts Sol's challenge to a "space-off" in the asteroid belt. But when Sol gets in trouble, Adelaide and Jet perform a heroic rescue and rediscover what being a Nova is all about.

programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: Exlosers S4
programme.desc: Clan's grandmother is admitted to the hospital, and he blames the gang. He is now worried that he may be sent to a foster home. Daryl invites Janice to attend class at the tuition center. They meet Leonard and Justin. When Benny, their teacher, walks in, they get a shock!

programme.title: This Land Is Mine
programme.desc: Major Habibullah goes on trial with George as his defence lawyer, but faces an uphill battle when the soldiers of his own camp turn against him. Dennis hatches a plan - with help from an unexpected quarter - to uncover the mystery behind Nakamura's case. June tries to confront the demons of her past, but they will not leave her alone.

programme.title: Fighting Spiders
programme.desc: Set in post 60's Singapore, in rustic kampongs, and the colorful chaotic streets of Chinatown, FIGHTING SPIDERS is a coming of age, adventure, story of three boys - Soon Lee (Edwin Goh), Charlie (Liang Shijie Jason) and Peter (Frederick Fielding), whose friendship is tested when they go to Malaysia on a quest to find and return with the King Spider, so as to challenge their nemesis, and bully, Ah Huat.

programme.title: Tribes
programme.desc: The teens learn that with great power (and independence) comes great responsibility. Spencer finds he shares a lot in common with his new friend and ASEAN scholar, Andy as they both struggle to balance between their sports and studies. At the same time, Kylie grows jealous of Winston's increasing concern for Emily, and begins to seek a more concrete answer from Winston. Are they a couple?

programme.desc: After the kids successfully grow potato plants in Jet's back yard garden, Jet wants to try to grow them on Mars. Celery takes them to Mars with some small potato plant sprouts to try their experiment. After the first one instantly freezes, they try to figure out what's missing from Earth that they can provide on Mars, namely a breathable atmosphere, water, and heat. Eventually they make a little greenhouse habitat to successfully grow the potato, a la "The Martian".

programme.desc: 圣诞岛，印度洋上的一个小岛，面积只有135平方公里。 丰富的磷酸盐矿产，孕育了当地无数的华人家庭，但如今岛民无法仅仰赖它，必须要到外开创更多的出路。圣诞岛的未来会是怎么样？岛上的华人还愿意继续留下来吗？.

programme.title: 大大的梦想
programme.desc: (PG) 思彤得知自己可能永久瘫痪，大受打击。她不愿拖累勇杰，要勇杰陪她到花园跳最后一支舞，然后与勇杰分手。勇杰不放弃，在泳池里扮美人鱼激励思彤，不料突然脚抽筋，在水中挣扎。思彤见状，忘记自己受伤的事，奋力跳入水中救勇杰……。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 行行吃狀元
programme.desc: 邱继学骑单车以自由不羁为方程式，无论顺遂与波折都是沿途风景的一部分，也往往邂逅到意想不到的缘分。他骑单车去觅食。白云吞面，芋头饭、喝猪杂汤，香气芬馥的芋头饭是狠角色。.

programme.title: 斗罗大陆
programme.desc: (PG) 雪星亲王以繁星戏团为筹码，要欧思客退出史兰客。欧思客十分心动。.

programme.title: 真探
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)庆雄离开警队开设私家侦探社，专门调查悬案。侦探社的另两名侦探是他的前下属渝阳，以及毫无侦探经验的俊焱。侦探社接到的第一起案子是8年前的公园裸尸案，女死者李晓晴在公园被人奸杀，委托人是她的男朋友蓝海峰，但海峰也曾是最大的嫌疑人.

programme.title: 我是媒体人
programme.desc: 造型设计师练习生雅媗和思玲分别为艺人试装，由于准备不足，显得手忙脚乱，表现令人失望。与此同时，雅媗和思玲以及综艺助理编导练习生雨荷和妤庭各别参与了“红星大奖之星光大道”的彩排和MV拍摄工作，真正见识到一个大型节目背后投入的庞大人力物力。接下来，雨荷和妤庭接到新挑战，而雅媗和思玲的“升值改造”考验也有了结果，谁的设计能赢得评审的青睐呢？敬请继续锁定.

programme.title: 甘味人生

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、.

programme.title: 阿贤喝咖啡

programme.desc: 地球的气温不断上升，也导致我们的冰盖和冰川融化。这会导致海平面上升，对新加坡这个小岛国，肯定不是好事。2019年，我们成为东南亚第一个征收碳税的国家。我们也承诺，到了2050年，将温室气体排放量，减至顶峰水平的一半。多数国家把碳中和的目标，定在2050年左右。新加坡的一群年轻人，却发布了一份名为《绿色枢纽 - 新加坡》的建议书 – 希望我们在2040年取得碳中和。是务实，还是发白日梦？新加坡还能采取什么措施？还是干脆把问题留给下一代去承担.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: (PG) 这里是德国南部的巴伐利亚州，讲到这四个字，你会想到什么？我会想到传统服装、音乐、超大啤酒杯、酸菜和烤猪脚！现在进来的这个小镇叫做「罗腾堡」，如果你有来德国玩过，可能会知道德国有两条经典的观光路线：罗曼蒂克大道和城堡大道。沿着这两条大道，有非常多经典的景点。这次我要带你们进入童话的世界～一起跟着庆典去旅行啰～.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 绍源要求信慕到公寓去照顾汉洁。信慕骗英惠他必须去吊唁，找机会离开家里到公寓去。英惠起疑，到公寓去一探究竟。邮差送亲子鉴定报告到公寓去。英惠拆开来看，发现委托人信慕和汉洁是亲子关系。.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 英惠以为信慕有私生女，深受打击。绍源本来要承认汉洁是他的女儿，燕珠和春玉却在这个时候抵达公寓凑热闹。信慕为了顾全绍源的婚姻，只好说汉洁是他的女儿，并向英惠道歉。.

programme.title: 捉迷藏

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 海兰在俊植的办公室里看到一封信后激动地晕倒。彩琳读了那封信，发现一匿名人士说他知道秀雅的下落。彩琳把信收起来，说没有看到任何信，导致没有人相信海兰。.

programme.title: 婉通夫人
